.M.M.A Language

E.M.M.A Language is an interperter for Emma applications. More...

E.M.M.A Language is an interperter for Emma applications.

E.M.M.A Language

The Emmal is a solution for network programming by scripting. Emma contains an emmal interpreter core which is used by the notification report mechanism and the value field of a PUT method order.

Operator

  • %
  • *
  • /
  • -
  • +
  • >
  • <
  • ||
  • &&
  • !

Variable

  • this.{Ressource Name}
  • this.time 
     !this.time%9
